00002 class OsimoDynamic{
00003  public $osimo;
00004  protected $allowOpts;
00005  
00006  function OsimoDynamic($allowOpts){
00007   $this->osimo = get("osimo");
00008   if(!is_array($allowOpts)){
00009    $this->allowOpts = explode(',',$allowOpts);
00010   }
00011   else{
00012    $this->allowOpts = $allowOpts;
00013   }
00014  }
00015  
00016  protected function parseOptions($options){
00017   foreach($this->allowOpts as $opt){
00018    isset($options[$opt]) ? $this->$opt = $options[$opt] : $this->$opt = NULL;
00019   }
00020  }
00021  
00022  protected function buildWhere(){
00023   $whereOpts = array();
00024   foreach($this->allowOpts as $opt){
00025    if(!empty($opt)){
00026     $whereOpts[] = $opt.'='.get('db')->escape($this->$opt,true);
00027    }
00028   }
00029   
00030   return implode(",",$whereOpts);
00031  }
00032 }
